text: The name Claire is a female given name. It is pronounced [ klair ]. It means clear in French. The popularity of the name in United Kingdom peaked in the 1970s and 1980s. Around 1997, the name fell out of the top 100 girls' names there. Many famous people have this name. This name was ranked #59 on the US Popular Names in 2021. One of them is the actress Claire Danes. == People == * Claire Martin, pseudonym of the Canadian writer Claire Montreuil * Claire Danes, American actress * Claire Bloom, English actress * Claire Holt, Australian actress * Claire Nouvian, French political activist, journalist and television producer * Claire Lee Chennault, US military aviator, fl. World War II ==References== Category:Given names
title: Claire
